alert.note: Alert for West Cameron (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 10:43AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Cameron and south central Calcasieu Parishes through 1115 AM CDT... At 1043 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Hackberry, or 9 miles north of Sabine National Wildlife, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Sulphur, Lake Charles Regional Airport, Carlyss and Hackberry. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 19 and 27. Interstate 210 between mile markers 1 and 5. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
